#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    string str,player;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>player>>str;
        int count[26];
        for(int i=0;i<26;i++)
            count[i]=0;
        for(int i=0;i<str.length();i++)
            count[str[i]-97]++;
        int val=0;
        for(int i=0;i<26;i++)
            val=val^count[i];
        if(val==0)
        {
            if(player=="Tarun")
                player="Varun";
            else
                player="Tarun";
        }
        cout<<player<<"\n";
    }
}
/*
3
Tarun aaa
Varun ababa
Tarun abacd
*/
